Nepalgunj has a sub-tropical climate. Temperatures sometimes exceed 40°C (104°F) from April to June. During the rainy season—arriving in June and lasting into September—it is less hot but sometimes very humid. Winter is usually pleasant while the sun is out.  It sometimes is foggy and overcast; then it can be chilly with temperatures below 10°C (41°F) but no frost. The highest temperature ever recorded in Nepalgunj was 45.0 °C (113.0 °F) on 16 June 1995
column2: while the lowest temperature ever recorded was −0.3 °C (31.5 °F) on 9 January 2013.
